dcterms:creator: L. Deng
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digit images, widely used for training various image processing systems. It contains a training set of 60,000 examples and a test set of 10,000 examples, with each image being a 28 × 28 grayscale image associated with labels from 10 classes.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: FashionMNIST is a dataset of Zalando's article images, designed as a more challenging replacement for the MNIST dataset. It contains a training set of 60,000 examples and a test set of 10,000 examples, with each image being a 28 × 28 grayscale image associated with labels from 10 categories of clothing.
dcterms:title: FashionMNIST
